title: Medical Prescription
description: Template for a standard medical prescription

fields.title: Patient Information
fields.description: Details about the patient receiving the prescription,Includes the patient's full name, date of birth, and other identifying details

list.title: Prescribing Doctor
list.description: Information about the doctor issuing the prescription

list.title: Prescription Date
list.description: The date when the prescription was issued, in the numbers format YYYY-MM-DD

tables.title: Medications
tables.description: List of prescribed medications with details

columns.title: Medication Name
columns.description: The name of the prescribed medication
columns.extraDescription: Includes the brand name or generic name

list.title: Dosage
list.extraDescription: Typically includes the amount (e.g., mg) and frequency

list.title: Quantity
list.description: Total quantity of the medication prescribed, Usually indicated as a total number of pills, milliliters, etc.

list.title: Instructions
list.description: Instructions for how the patient should take the medication, Detailed usage instructions (e.g., take with food, take twice a day)
